Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Northbound Reroute near Halsted/Belmont
ShortDescription: Northbound 156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Diversey and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Diversey and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Belmont.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #43 43rdTemporary Eastbound Reroute near 42nd/Halsted.
ShortDescription: 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Root, Normal, 43rd, and Wentworth due to, street blockage near 42rd/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Root, Normal, 43rd, and Wentworth, due to street blockage near 42nd/Halsted.
